channel.title: How do i add sprites to a client?
channel.description: How do i add sprites to a client? Hi, I've just come back to private servers again, after a long leave. And now there are these "custom sprites" I have a set, not how do i add them? [br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2007, 11:48:17 PM[/size][hr]C'mon guys, its urgent![br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2007, 11:55:35 PM[/size][hr]Never mind, ive added them, no thanks to you!

item.title: How do i add sprites to a client?
item.dc:creator: @sniper12903 sniper12903
item.description:
@sniper12903 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:4, topic:119198”][quote author=sniper12903 link=topic=168308.msg2025368#msg2025368 date=1201855998]

I can make my own sprites, but i don’t know how to actually add them into the client.

Could you tell me how to add them?

I could download a client with custom sprites but i want to do it myself…

well ther are diffrent sprites for diffrent clients…ive been dealing with dogs client and thers just a folder ther wer u put spirtes in…its a folder called sprites…but ther are differnt sprites for diffrent clients…some cant be changed
[/quote]
Anything can be changed. It would just require some cache editing.
Oh, and fuck Dog Eat Dog’s client. Anyone can follow a few tutorials and post a client that’s already been made by 4 other people.[/quote]

I kno…my friends and i have remade it like 50 times mostly graphic-wise tho…and wat about silab wer all it is is a .bat and watever that java one is file u kno how to edit those sprites?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add sprites to a client?

item.title: How do i add sprites to a client?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“sniper12903, post:3, topic:119198”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=168308.msg2024695#msg2024695 date=1201836231]
I can make my own sprites, but i don’t know how to actually add them into the client.

Could you tell me how to add them?

I could download a client with custom sprites but i want to do it myself…
[/quote]

well ther are diffrent sprites for diffrent clients…ive been dealing with dogs client and thers just a folder ther wer u put spirtes in…its a folder called sprites…but ther are differnt sprites for diffrent clients…some cant be changed[/quote]
Anything can be changed. It would just require some cache editing.
Oh, and fuck Dog Eat Dog’s client. Anyone can follow a few tutorials and post a client that’s already been made by 4 other people.

Read full topic
